The Dramatics is a romantic comedy about a sweet, but stressed out actress, who
unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation
of a best-selling, erotic chick lit novel and her loving, but tortured stoner
boyfriend, who is forced to deal with it. Loosely based on the lives of Kat Foster
and Scott Rodgers, who co-penned the script and co-star in the film, The Dramatics
marks their first feature together and Rodger's directorial debut.
